about_the_game:
You wake up in an abandoned place, with no memories, trapped in a site that defies all logic. As you explore, violent and disturbing hallucinations haunt you, and a mysterious figure whispers unsettling warnings. What is real and what isn't? Only you can uncover the truth before it's too late.


Face a crumbling reality as you explore a desolate hospital, where nothing is as it seems. Amidst the darkness and chaos, hallucinations chase you, and an enigmatic figure seems always one step ahead, either guiding or haunting you. Can you trust what you see? The only way to escape is to uncover the truth... if you survive long enough to find it.

  • Psychological Horror: Experience a terrifying journey where reality blends with hallucinations, keeping you in constant uncertainty.

  • Unsettling Exploration: Explore an abandoned hospital filled with dark secrets and clues to uncover the truth.

  • Disturbing Hallucinations: Bloody, violent visions that distort your perception of the world and heighten the tension.

  • Shifting Environment: A setting that changes and distorts as you progress, challenging your perception of reality.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Detailed graphics and immersive sound design that draw you into an oppressive, terrifying environment.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains explicit violence, blood, and bodily mutilation. There are graphic scenes of violent hallucinations, mutilated body parts, and disturbing psychological situations. It includes sensitive themes such as mental disorders and emotional distress.

name: Paranoide

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 560 (4 GB) or NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 o Intel Core i5-9400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 580 (4 GB) o NVIDIA GTX 1660 (6 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: You wake up in an abandoned place, with no memory, trapped in a location that defies logic. As you explore, violent hallucinations stalk you, and a mysterious figure whispers unsettling words. What is real? Only you can uncover the truth before it’s too late.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
